location.title: Location
location.you-can-also-search-for: You can also search for a specific location or choose from the list below
location.how-do-i-find-google-maps-coordinates: How do I find Google maps coordinates?
location.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-this-loc: Are you sure you want to delete this location {{data?.name}}?
location.your-location-has-been-created:
Your location was successfully finalized and an email was sent to you confirming the operation.
Please make sure to follow the progress in this platform!
location.add-your-first-location-and-start-managi:
Add your first location and start managing assets.
After you added a new location you can set other details such as
residents, access points, parking place, etc.

user.title: User
user.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-user-nam: Are you sure you want to delete user {{name}} ?
user.your-user-has-been-created:
Your user was successfully finalized and an email was sent to you confirming the operation.
Please make sure to follow the progress in this platform!
user.add-your-users-and-start-managing-users:
Add your users and start managing users.
After you added a new user you can set other details such as
contacts, emails, address, etc.

user-role.title: User Role
user-role.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-user-rol: Are you sure you want to delete user role {{name}} ?
user-role.there-re-no-user-roles-enrolled: There are no user roles enrolled
user-role.add-your-first-user-role-and-start-manag:
Add your first user role and start managing user roles.
After you added a new user role you can set other details such as
residents, access points, parking place, etc.

custom-field.name-your-field-and-choose-desired-type: Name your field and choose desired type

booking.this-is-yard-platform: This is Yard platform for scheduling your unloading.
booking.all-the-data-requested: All the data requested through this form are necessary as a result of the legal requirements in Romania on security zones or for the development of contractual relations.
booking.for-a-secure-connection: For a secure connection, please answer the question
booking.choose-one-of-the-options: Please choose one of the options below.
booking.please-fill-in-data-below: Please fill in the data in the form below, as they are necessary for the quick processing of access to the Port of Constanta.
booking.please-fill-to-modify-request: Please fill in the fields below to identify the request. The code to modify a reservation was sent in the confirmation message of the initial reservation.
booking.please-fill-to-cancel-request: Te rog completeaza campurile de mai jos pentru a identifica solicitarea. Codul de anulare a unei rezervari a fost trimis in mesajul de confirmare al rezervarii initiale.
booking.registered-successfully:
You have successfully registered!
When you arrive at your destination, please go to the access point in the parking lot for document verification.
Later, you will be notified by SMS when you proceed to download.

using the icon in the right column of the table.
